enableWelcomeDesc: Start publishing your books, fanfiction, stories and poems in the # 1 app for writers and poets
searchUsersHeader: Start to read a new authors
searchUsersDesc: Subscribe to authors you are interested in to improve recommendations.
askAgeAndCityDesc: This will allow us to more accurately make recommendations and hide inappropriate content.
enableSponsorsDesc: Your creativity is worth it to receive a reward for it. Set the cost of a monthly subscription, share your page on social networks and publish exclusive content for your loyal fans.
enablePremiumDesc: Thanks to Premium Subscription, you will get new opportunities to promote your creativity
enableEventsDesc: Share information about your events and sell tickets directly to Ryfma. Follow interesting events, you will not miss the performance of your favorite author.
enableContestsDesc: Try yourself in contests or create your own. Tournament table, joint voting of several jury members at once, multi-stage competitions and much more!
enableShareHeader: Share your page on your socials
enableShareDesc: Send link to your page your friends in social networks, messengers and by email
enablePopularDesc: Read and follow your favorite authors, share interesting stories with friends, communicate with authors and readers
enablePremiumProhibitedDesc: Upgrade your account to Premium to get access to new features, help develop the platform and support developing of new features
enablePremiumProhibitedHeader: The page is available to Premium users
enablePremiumProhibitedUsers: Many authors monthly support Ryfma and use all the features to promote their creativity. Thank you, we are improving the platform for you!
